COVID RESPONSE Amalgamated Bank’s primary objective during the COVID-19 
pandemic has been for the health and well-being of the 
company’s employees, customers, and communities. 
Amalgamated Bank is committed to providing support to those 
who are affected by the unprecedented challenges that the 
country is facing. Financially, Amalgamated was well prepared 
to weather the storm through our 2019 actions of de-risking 
the balance sheet and improving the quality of the investment 
portfolio. This provided us a strong position to maintain our 
workforce, respond quickly to the challenges of the pandemic, 
and find solutions for our stakeholders.
